name: The last Trip of the Magic Bus
name_original: The last Trip of the Magic Bus
description:
This month the famous Magic Bus has taken away into a secret place.

In this game you have to pickup the bus with an helicopter.. 

There are several enemies along the way that don't want that you remove the bus from his original place.

Avoid the enemies in 4 different levels and put the bus in the secret place.

To play use the arrows to move the helicopter and Space to shoot the bombs.

You can also use a gamepad.

Developer: Mauro Rilla

Royalty Free Music from Bensound
